entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 3:30 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along the coast. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along the coast.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along the coast. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023
